canSendGreeting: You can send a greeting today!
oneGreetingPerDay: One greeting is allowed per day.
alreadySentGreeting: You've already sent a greeting today
canSendTomorrow: You can send another greeting tomorrow.
connectToSeeStatus: Connect your wallet to see your greeting status.
greetingRecorded: Your greeting is recorded on blockchain
transactionSuccessDescription: Your transaction has been processed successfully. It may take a few moments to reflect in your transaction history.
enterNFTText: Enter your text to mint as an NFT...
nftPreviewPlaceholder: Your NFT text will appear here...
textNFTDescription: Text NFTs are unique digital assets that store your text permanently on the blockchain.
immutable: Immutable - Your text is permanently stored
tradable: Tradable - Can be sold on NFT marketplaces
unique: Unique - Each token has a unique identifier
viewWallet: View it in your wallet or NFT marketplace
shareLink: Share it on social media with a unique link
tradeNFT: Trade it on NFT marketplaces like OpenSea
proofOwnership: Use it as a proof of creation or ownership
connectViewCollection: Connect your wallet to view your NFT collection
noNFTsYet: You don't have any Text NFTs in your collection yet
connectViewTransaction: Connect your wallet to view your transaction history

connectMetamask: Please install MetaMask to use this application.
wrongNetwork: Please connect to Ethereum Mainnet to use this application.
